description: Tamaki`s younger brother and the protagonist`s best friend and classmate. He fills in the role of "perverted friend". He is often interested in other girls unlike Tamaki, and is often the victim of his elder sister`s ire in the form of painful forehead-crushing grips. He often gets jealous of Takaki "taking" all the girls. He likes cameras, but he likes taking pictures of girls more.
name: Kousaka Yuuji
